element.name: Description
element.description: An account of the resource

elementText.text: Using big money in order to try and change public schooling is never going to work, and just allows power and decisions to come from private donors. Systematic, government-based change needs to happen in order for things to change.

element.name: Description
element.description: An account of the resource

elementText.text: Podcast about school discipline across America with focus on a restorative justice program in an urban public school

element.name: Title
element.description: A name given to the resource

elementText.text:
Is This Working?
Stories of schools struggling with what to do with misbehaving kids. There's no general agreement about what teachers should do to discipline kids. And there's evidence that some of the most popular punishments actually may harm kids.
